events.message: I just received the blender I ordered, and unfortunately it has a large crack on the main glass container. I’m very disappointed as I wanted to use it right away.
The issue has been categorized as Product Defect due to the customer's report of a cracked glass container on the delivered blender.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. from the product support team to address the defective product issue.
Hello! I’m Sarah from the product support team. I’m sorry to hear about the crack in your blender. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us a few photos of the cracked glass container so we can assess the damage and proceed with the appropriate solution?
I attached several photos showing the crack clearly on the glass jar. It looks like it happened during transit as the box was slightly damaged on arrival.
Thank you for the pictures. We can either send you a replacement glass container at no extra cost or offer a full replacement of the blender. Which option would you prefer?
I would prefer a full replacement of the blender if possible, please. That way I’m sure it’s all brand new and tested.
We have arranged for a full replacement blender to be shipped to your address with expedited delivery. You will receive tracking information shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement blender and that it is in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the replacement was received and no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on how we handled your defective product issue.
